nodes.text: Graffiti was a type of vandalism, in which a being etched messages on public property. In 5 ABY, Zorba Desilijic Tiure led a group of bounty hunters to terrorize visitors to Hologram Fun World; one of their means of driving away the tourists was to etch graffiti on the Hologram Fun World Administration Building with their blasters.
The Meatlump Gang also used graffiti to mark their territory.
